content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (20.5, -4.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (4.5, -10.5)
- Steam Engine at Position (22.5, -7.5)
- Boiler at Position (20.5, -4.0)
- Pipe network connecting the offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (2.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0) with no ingredients to smelt

### Water Distribution System
Consists of:
- PipeGroup at Position (5.5, -8.5) carrying water
- PipeGroup at Position (18.5, -3.5) carrying water

### Steam Distribution System
Consists of:
- PipeGroup at Position (19.5, -12.5) carrying steam

### Electrical Network
Consists of:
- ElectricityGroup with poles at various positions including (18.5, -15.5), (23.5, -12.5), (10.5, -10.5), and others

### Research Lab
- Lab at Position (not specified) working on electronics with automation science packs

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items due to lack of inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities like boilers.

### Errors related to furnaces with no ingredients
- Make sure to supply the necessary raw materials to the furnaces to keep production running smoothly.
